name: MIDAS
desc: MIning Differentially Activated Subpaths of KEGG pathways from multi-class RNA-seq data

name: BRCA-Pathway
desc: Web based TCGA Omics Data Mapping System on KEGG pathways

name: In Silico experiment tool
desc:
In Silico experiment with three-level network Tool for User given Hypothesis of KO mouse
\ The online instant hypothesis web analyzer in slilico experiment tool.

name: RDDpred
desc: RDDpred: a condition-specific RNA-editing prediction model from RNA-seq data.

name: TimeTP
desc:
Influence maximization in time bounded network\
    identifies transcription factors regulating perturbed pathways

name: TimesVector
desc: A vectorized clustering approach to the analysis of time series transcriptome data from multiple phenotypes

name: Context-MMIA
desc: Context-MMIA is miRNA - mRNA target prediction system combining expression data and literature data.

name: ContextTRAP
desc: ContextTRAP is novel approach for prioritizing pathways by utilizing both results from pathway analysis tools and the literature information.

name: DegPack
desc: Identifying DEGs in multiclass RNA-seq data

name: SpliceHetero
desc: A novel computational method to measure spliceome level intra-tumor heterogeneity (sITH) in breast cancer
